5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

$right-button

Constant

Summary

A constant that represents the right button on the attached pointing device.

Type

<integer>

Value

ash(1, %button_base + 2)

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

A constant that represents the right button on the attached pointing device.

See also

$left-button, page 293

$middle-button, page 312

$pointer-buttons, page 322

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
